document_data.mainbody:
oeb the Cutpurse was a hin thief who was imprisoned in the jail of Mulsantir in the late 14 century DR.
Joeb was a halfling man with a light skin tone and brown receiving hair. His appearance and mannerisms made it clear the hin thief was not from Rashemen.
In the , the adventurer known as the Knight-Commander, or Kalach-Cha, roused the spirits of Rashemen. Soon after the Knight-Commanders arrival to Mulsantir, an army of spirits, telthors led by the Bear-God Okku, gathered outside and demanded the life of the Knight-Commander. The adventurer approached Tirzah the Old, the witch-warden of Mulsantirs jail was to help find allies, willing or unwilling, who would stand beside the Knight-Commander against angry spirits. Tirzah insisted that hagspawn named Gannayev-of-Dreams, another hagspawn Mighty Groznek, and Joeb the Cutpurse were not to be trusted. Joeb had no interest in facing sure death at the paws of angry spirits he claimed to be just a traveler from Luiren who found himself in a kerfuffle and a misunderstanding in regard to the ownership of some coins in Mulsantirs bazar.
